column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The byob policy is controversial for some. You've heard about it--bring a bottle and a glass is then bestowed to another table. I've been here a couple times and have been dismayed when a glass of our delicious Dom Perignon was given to another table only to sit untouched all evening. Can I have that back? Too good to waste. Most other times
column2: people have appreciated sharing in our bubbly and/or wine
column3: and have stopped by our table to thank us. It's always gratifying when someone does that. I love the conviviality the byob policy provides
column4: and I've not seen that elsewhere. Don't like it? Then you can always order beer
column5: wine or cocktails off the menu and then you don't have to share.
